import styles from './styles.module.css'


type TagColor = 'gray' | 'blue' | 'orange' | 'green' | 'pink' | 'purple'


interface TagProps <BODY TagProps>

export const Tag = ({

  className,

  color = 'gray',

  icon,

  children,

}: TagProps) => <BODY Tag>

interface SkeletonProps <BODY SkeletonProps>

export const TagSkeleton = ({ className, width = 120 }: SkeletonProps) => <BODY TagSkeleton>
